alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Freestone; Leon; Limestone; Robertson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 6:14PM CDT until June 21 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Freestone County in central Texas... Eastern Robertson County in central Texas... Leon County in central Texas... Eastern Limestone County in central Texas... Southwestern Anderson County in central Texas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 613 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Montalba to 8 miles north of Buffalo to Groesbeck, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Palestine, Mexia, Groesbeck, Teague, Fairfield, Buffalo, Elkhart, Centerville, Fort Boggy State Park, Camp Creek Lake, Lake Limestone, Twin Oak Reservoir, Fort Parker State Park, Fairfield Lake State Park, Corinth, Jewett, Hilltop Lakes, Redland, Normangee and Oakwood. This includes Interstate 45 between mile markers 152 and 197. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
